text: Dare ga, ten to ji o sōzō shita no ka. Mata dare ga anata gata no tame ni, ten kara ame o furaseru no ka. Sorede ware wa, utsukushī kaju-en o oi shigera seru. Soko no jumoku o seichō sa seru koto wa, anata gata ni wa dekinai. Arrā to tomoni (sore ga dekiru soto no) kami ga arou ka. Iya, kare-ra wa (tadashī michi kara) hazureta mindearu
